files.patch: @@ -39,0 +39,6 @@ + * Warning: + * Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with + * future Swing releases. The current serialization support is + * appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running + * the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage + * of all JavaBeans has been added to the java.beans package.

@@ -131,0 +131,8 @@ + *

Swing's Serialization policy

+ * Warning: + * Serialized objects of any Swing class will not be compatible with + * future Swing releases. The current serialization support is + * appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running + * the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage + * of all JavaBeans has been added to the java.beans package. + *

@@ -45,0 +45,6 @@ + * Warning: + * Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with + * future Swing releases. The current serialization support is + * appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running + * the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage + * of all JavaBeans has been added to the java.beans package
